content:
Just like the original trail you found, this one looks like it leads out of the laboratory and into the nearby caves. You could follow it, but you’re not sure the ooze poses a dire threat to the arcology’s ecosystem, and you doubt you’re going to find any valuable technology or artifacts in the caves.

Rangers Choose:

A) Follow the trail. Discard all   from Trail of Ooze. Attach the FOLLOWING A LEAD mission to Trail of Ooze. Clear the Trail of Ooze with   while at a cave location to discover what made it.

B) We don't have time for this. Discard the Trail of Ooze and return FOLLOWING A LEAD to the collection. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue.
